## TsrpcErrorType enum

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum TsrpcErrorType 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ApiError | <code>&quot;ApiError&quot;</code> | The business error returned by <code>call.error</code>. It is always business-relatived, for example <code>call.error('Password is incorrect')</code>, <code>call.error('Not enough credit')</code>, etc. |
|  ClientError | <code>&quot;ClientError&quot;</code> | Client exception, for example parse server output error. (May because of the proto file is not the same between server and client) |
|  NetworkError | <code>&quot;NetworkError&quot;</code> | Network error, like connection broken, network timeout, etc. |
|  ServerError | <code>&quot;ServerError&quot;</code> | Server exception, for example "request format error", "database exception", etc. |
